reviewText: These 2 DVDs are so wonderful. To see so many of the greats all seated together and singing one by one, and sometimes together, is a country music fan's Hillbilly Heaven dream. I especially enjoyed Barbara Fairchild. I loved her "Teddy Bear Song" when she was young. She has matured so beautifully. Her rendition of "You've Got Me Under Your Spell Again" just brings goosebumps. Also loved Willie and Kris Kristoferson. But the entire bunch is fantastic. I highly recommend this!

After searching throughout the entire world I finally found Ralph Emery's Country Legends DVD Vol 1 & 2 at Amazon. I had seen some excerpts on
You Tube and it was so promising that I decided to get them. The 2
DVDs are exceptionally good The sound and image are brilliant, the
artists all legends: Kris Kristoffesron, Willie Nelson, Glen Campbell,
B.J.Thomas, Bobby Bare, Porter Wagoner, Mickey Gilley, Gene Watson,
B.J.Shaver, Lorrie Morgan, Janie Fricke, the incredible Barbara Fair-
child, Mel Tillis. It's a fantastic jam session and the interpretations sound sometimes even better than the originals on record. The artists
tell us the whereabouts of each song and the whole show is out of this
world. A special mention of the band behind the singers. An abolute
must for the real country fans especially for all of us who loved
country music from the 60's, 70's and 80's. This incredible country
gathering is divided into 2 DVDs so you need both. Each one lasts
approximately 90 minutes so the complete gathering is a little over
3 hours.

I gave Volume I and II to my father for Christmas and he loves them. My parents used to watch Ralph Emery regularly - and they were some of his biggest fans. Mom is gone now, but dad (who is 84 and still runs a large farm) watches these DVD's over and over. Ralph Emery and all of his guests are classics. Good entertainment for young and old!
I cannot recommend this DVD highly enough, a bunch of country music legends picking, singing and obviously having a great time. Well worth the money.

If you like country music then you must have this DVD! There are tons of country stars on this video, names like Gene Watson, Bobby Bear, Mel Tillis and many more. As always the very informative Ralph Emery gets the best stories from them too! You'll love it!
mom loved it!
I did not like this DVD at all!  Wish I could send it back!
Very entertaining with great stars!
Loved it !!
Buy it, you'll love it. Just a great DVD to watch and so much info on it from the stars... Very high quality

Loved this collection. Wish they had more. Loved hearing some of the great Country songs. Which is dead now, I dislike the new country.
We always enjoy watching Ralph Emery and the country stars. It is so enjoyable watching them just as they are!

It was another night of great entertainment This was a no. 1 tv show and a  very highly rated one back then .wish they were doing this again in this generationI AM SO HAPPY THAT THEY MADE DVD'S AND CDS OF ALL THESE UNFORGETTABLE LEGENDS
As a country music musician myself I can vouch for the efforts of the grand ole opry folks in trying to keep the old styles and class filled artists alive on dvd keep em coming folks

If you  love country music this is one of the best DVD's I have ever purchased.
One and half hours of country artist singing some of their greatest hits.
I bought this for a Christmas present and they like it. They enjoy hearing the old classics. I would recommend this product.
Bought this for my Mom for Christmas, she loved it. She loves country music especially the old timers.  Thank you.
Everything you could want, and nice to see Weldon Myrick on steel.  Being a steelie myself, that's the real reason I love Country Music.
1st vol of 2 sets of dvd`s, see my review of number two ,same applies to this dvd as vol 2 ,
Enjoyed watching it.  Everyone is so young.  A keeper.  Well done.  I hate this having to have so many words.

Some really great performances by people who actually know what country music is supposed  to be.  Willie Nelson & Kris Kristofferson are outstanding & Gene Watson is one of the best voices in country music today.

If you like the artists mentioned on these 2 DVDs, don't hesitate. Order now. You won't be sorry. Stories, songs and lots of memories. I had 'em on VHS, now got 'em on DVD. Never tire of watching them over and over.

My friends and I have really enjoyed singing along with these great songs.  I think Barbara Fairchild is my favorite singer after watching these and Lorrie Morgan is just gorgeous.  What video is available with Lorrie singing Crazy ?  Would love to have that one also.

Ralph Emery's one of the greatest to get performers to revel personal stories and that is what helps us to love them. They are true, serious and dedicated to their talents and their talents are wonderful. As a true County Music fan I just love being a part of his shows.

I grew up on these great songs and watching these artists perform them.  Many of them still have amazing voices to sing and you get to hear an informal "jam session" with them singing their classics.  This is priceless!

I expected more from this DVD,  I was not impressed with alot of the singers or their song selection.  There a few great songs but far and few between.  Suggest saving your money and look for other country-western DVD's. Very disappointing.

The quality of both the recording and artists is excellent.
I gave 4 stars only because 5 stars means perfection. Not all the artists are my favourites.
I will now proceed to buy Vol. 2.
What do you expect, ralp emery and a star studded line up of the best in country music 10/10 buy it

A definite must have to any countrym usic lovers collection. Great stores and sonsgs from great country music stars.
They don't make them like this any more
Not much to say.  I always love Ralph in everything he does.  Got here quickly and in good condition.  Have purchased other things he put out and plan on doing so in the future

this dvd is great. it has a bunch of great singers and they have some interesting stories about how their hits came about. very informal setting allows each performer to be themselves. i like the way ralph emery relates to these artist. very entertaining.

Ordinarily, i don't care for narratives in music dvd's but it seemed that the talk in this one was not excessive and did not break up the continuity of the disk.  The selection and quality of the singers and songs was excellent.

Ralph Emery's Legends Vol #1 & #2 are the best DVDs  of
Country music ever. I have enjoyed watching them and listening
to all the stories they tell. The music is fantastic and
the stories are better than that. I can't say enough good thing about these
DVDs. Absolutely wonderful!

I have played the two DVDs over and over again and will never get tired of them. All big stars like Kris Kristoferson, Bobby Bare, Willie Nelson and many others giving their very best in such a casual surrounding. Sound quality is good. Everyone seems to be enjoying themselves and feel so at home with an excellent backing band too. I am looking forward to Vol. 3 since there are a few I have seen on U_tube which have not been included in these two volumes such as Bobby Bare singing "Four Strong winds" with Ralph commenting just how much he likes it!
Love it!
Great music by the artists!
Makes it more interesting is you watched the old Ralph Emery TV Show
Bought for a friend, and she loved it.
Some of the greatest artists performing in a wonderful, relaxed setting....just perfect
a big hit as a gift
Love it.
Wonderful stories and music from true Legends of Country Music.  Parents are very happy.
Love this DVD.
Bought this for my 72 year old father who loved the Ralph Emery Show. Great collection of artists  and songs. Four stars because video image quality not the best.
